tooltip_text.last_approved_text: This powerful heirloom was forged from the finest Bretonnian silverline. It catches the suns rays and magnifies them, dazzling Louen's enemies as he makes the death stroke.

tooltip_text.last_approved_text: Those that take a wound from the jagged blade of the Tormentor Sword will not only feel pain - their thoughts will be wracked with terrible omens.

tooltip_text.last_approved_text: This evil weapon entraps the souls of those in cleaves, binding their fleshless remains in servitude.

tooltip_text.last_approved_text: Such is the shine upon every scale in this resplendent mail that the foe can't help but be dazzled.

tooltip_text.last_approved_text: Whenever this blade tastes blood, its wielder seems to exert greater control over the Winds of Magic.

tooltip_text.last_approved_text: This unsettling weapon spreads a curse on all around, disabusing enemy Warriors of their martial skills.

tooltip_text.last_approved_text: Long thought lost to time and conflict, Grombrindal's awesome helm inspires already-courageous Dwarfen hearts to even greater acts of bravery.

tooltip_text.last_approved_text: A bang, a flash - the foes stagger slowly and blindly whilst you take full advantage of their disarray.

tooltip_text.last_approved_text: As battle-hardened as he is ancient, the White Dwarf will always stand his ground, no matter the pandemonium unfolding around him.

tooltip_text.last_approved_text: Mentioned in several sagas and legends, could the White Dwarf's mighty weapon be the fabled rune axe wielded by Grimnir at the dawn of history?
